attributes.action: Make council pay a fine if they issue a wrong penalty charge notice
attributes.additional_details: Lately the councils are making huge revenues from penalty charges and they don't get punished if the indipent adjudicator cancel them. This is a win situation from the council and a lose one from the drivers whatever happens
attributes.background: Council are raising wrong revenue to issue wrong penalty charge notice to drivers to rip them off because drivers don't waste time challenging the penalty charges
